docs.snippet: Pope Francis will offer a special blessing to a group of immigrants and refugees in New York, including those who are undocumented, highlighting two contentious issues in American politics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis will offer a special blessing to a group of immigrants and refugees in New York, including those who are undocumented, highlighting two contentious issues in American politics.

headline.main: Immigrants, Refugees to Receive Papal Blessing in NYC
headline.print_headline: Immigrants, Refugees to Receive Papal Blessing in NYC

docs.snippet: Relatives of an unarmed Mexican immigrant farmworker who was  shot dead this year by patrolmen in Washington state filed a federal lawsuit on Thursday seeking more than $25 million in damages....
docs.lead_paragraph: Relatives of an unarmed Mexican immigrant farmworker who was  shot dead this year by patrolmen in Washington state filed a federal lawsuit on Thursday seeking more than $25 million in damages.

headline.main: Family of Slain Washington State Farmworker Seeks $25 Million in U.S. Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Family of Slain Washington State Farmworker Seeks $25 Million in U.S. Lawsuit

docs.snippet: Officials in Bexar County, Tex., believe Gilbert Flores, who was killed by sheriff’s deputies, was holding a knife in his upraised hands....
docs.lead_paragraph: Officials in Bexar County, Tex., believe Gilbert Flores, who was killed by sheriff’s deputies, was holding a knife in his upraised hands.
docs.abstract: Bexar County, Tex, Sheriff Susan L Pamerleau raises concerns about second video of deputies fatally shooting Gilbert Flores in San Antonio, which shows that Flores had his hands in air, although he held object that officials believe was knife; video is not released.

headline.main: Officials Cite Possible Knife in 2nd Video of San Antonio Shooting
headline.print_headline: Sheriff Cites a 2nd Video in a Shooting by Deputies
